info.description: A Hexagonal Architecture E-Commerce API with product variations support
info.title: E-Commerce API

get.description: Get a paginated list of categories with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new category with the provided details

get.description: Get all top-level categories (with no parent)
Get detailed information about a category by its slug
Get detailed information about a category by its ID

put.description: Update an existing category with the provided details

delete.description: Delete a category by its ID

get.description: Get all direct child categories of a parent category
Get products in a category and optionally its subcategories
Get a complete category tree starting from a root category
Get a list of orders with optional filtering and pagination

post.description: Create a new order for a customer

get.description: Get a list of orders for a specific customer
Get detailed information about an order by its ID

put.description: Update the quantity of an item in an order

post.description: Add a product variation to an existing order
post.summary: Add an item to an order

delete.description: Remove a product variation from an order
delete.summary: Remove an item from an order

put.description: Set payment information for an order
Update the status of an order
Set shipping tracking information for an order

get.description: Get a list of products with optional filtering and pagination

post.description: Create a new product with the provided details

get.description: Get a list of products in a specific category
Get detailed information about a product by its ID

delete.description: Delete a product by its ID

post.description: Add a new variation to an existing product
post.summary: Add a variation to a product

put.description: Update an existing variation of a product

delete.description: Remove a variation from a product

put.description: Update the stock quantity of a product variation

post.description: Authenticate a user and return a JWT token

get.description: Get the profile of the currently authenticated user
Get detailed information about a user by their ID
Get all addresses for a user

post.description: Add a new address for a user

put.description: Update an existing address for a user

delete.description: Delete an address for a user

put.description: Set an address as the default for a user

categories.description: Category IDs the product belongs to
